TextView.android:text: Request for Copy of Local Development Plans

This service offers offices or any transacting public a copy of government plans for purposes of research and any other lawful purpose. The MPDO can provide copies of government plans, including the Comprehensive Land Use Plan, Comprehensive Development Plan among others available to the office.
1. Letter Request for MPDO plan/s Fill-out the logbook
If a soft copy is requested:
1. Provide mail address and sign Logbook
1.1. Prepare copies of requested plan/send softcopy of plan through email
2.1. Inform client through call or text if email is sent.
If document/s are to be photocopied:
1.1. Check for completeness of information in the Logbook
If physical document/s are to be borrowed:
1.1. Check for completeness of information in the Logbook
2.1. Receive and inspect the returned Documents
3.1. Let the client fill out the logbook for the return of documents.
4. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drop it in the Feedback Box
4.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS)
